entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Near blizzard developing near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 58 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 59 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
